title: Nursing Practical Competencies Enhancement: Intermediate Mathematical Competencies in Corporate Settings Using Explicit Mathematics Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve 90% or higher participation in mathematical problem-solving processes applying explicit instruction (modeling-guided practice-independent practice-feedback).
Learners achieve 80% or higher correct response rates on formative assessments for 15 core math concepts (ratio, statistics, basic functions) presented within one week.
Learners utilize a real-time feedback system provided through a mobile platform to perform self-assessment and error correction at least three times per week.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
